item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Fabian Gonzalez üëã I’m a Senior Software Engineer and Tech Lead from Buenos Aires, Argentina, with over 10 years of experience in full-stack development, cloud solutions, and Adobe Experience Manager (AEM). Passionate about building fast, scalable web platforms, leading engineering teams, and delivering solutions that make a real impact. I‚Äôve worked with major global clients like Unilever, Whirlpool, Keysight, Colgate-Palmolive, and First Century Bank, developing high-performing web solutions, optimizing CMS workflows, and integrating AI and cloud-based systems.
